hbl.jag.tri.lib

Class CoordTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • hbl.jag.tri.lib.CoordTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CoordTransform
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    utility class that will transform raw micro-degree coordinate data to a Cartesian grid in micro degrees centered on Cx0,Cy0. if the CoordinateFlag is set to the static CARTESIAN then the transformation is a simple translation of the origin. If the CoordinateFlage is the static LAT_LONG then the transformation is Mercator centered around to same origin.
    Author:
    jag
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
